text: Jason E Chaffetz (; born March 26, 1967) was the U.S. representative for . He was elected in 2008. He is a member of the Republican Party. ==References== ==Other websites== * Congressman Jason Chaffetz official U.S. House site * Jason Chaffetz for Congress * * * * Collected news and commentary at The Salt Lake Tribune Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:American Latter Day Saints Category:Politicians from California Category:United States representatives from Utah Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Jason Chaffetz
